commit.message:
re PR c++/90801 (A recurring hang)

2019-06-13  Richard Biener  <rguenther@suse.de>

	PR c++/90801
	* typeck2.c (split_nonconstant_init_1): Properly count
	num_split_elts, optimize single constructor elt removal.

From-SVN: r272235
